channel.title: Quire & You
channel.description: Tips and thoughts to help you achieve your dreams and get things done.

item.title: How to Use Project Management Software to Measure Employee Productivity
item.dc:creator: Quire Marketing Team
item.description: Project management software can measure employee productivity without micromanaging by being able to easily see which tasks are completed by who and when.

item.title: 10 Ultimate Tips to Maximize Productivity for Your New Hybrid Work Life
item.dc:creator: Quire Marketing Team
item.description: If you’re looking to maximize productivity in your new hybrid work life, we’ve got 10 tips that can help you both at home and the office.

item.title: Introducing Quire Subscription Program: Empowering Teams to Dream Bigger
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Ready to bring your productivity to the next level with Quire? Your favorite software to manage your projects and track the team performance has been upgraded to give you more resources to dream bigger and achieve greater things.

item.title: Work-Life Balance is so Yesterday, Now We Need Work-Life Integration
item.dc:creator: Quire Marketing Team
item.description: Work-life balance requires trade-offs whereas work-life integration is about finding a harmony between all aspects of daily life. Find out how you can start implementing this today.

item.title: No More Unhealthy Overworking Culture; Be Productive Instead
item.dc:creator: Quire Marketing Team
item.description: The culture of overwork is unhealthy as it leads to burnout. The World Health Organization have characterized it as a syndrome, but there is a cure…

item.title: Languishing at Work? Here's How You can Bring Back the Magic to Your Job
item.dc:creator: Quire Marketing Team
item.description: Languishing at work? Here's how you can bring back the magic to your job with these 7 tips for managing languishing.

item.title: The Zeigarnik Effect and How it Affects Productivity
item.dc:creator: Quire Marketing Team
item.description: The Zeigarnik Effect left unchecked will negatively affect productivity and contribute to burnout. In this blog post we look at 5 ways it can be used to book productivity.

item.title: 7 Ways to Ensure Employees are Really Working When Working From Home
item.dc:creator: Quire Marketing Team
item.description: In this article we examine 7 ways to ensure your employees are really working when they’re working from home.

item.title: Quire for Microsoft Teams: Collaborate Smarter with Your Teammates
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Microsoft Teams is a conversation-based collaboration platform that provides chat and cross functional teams with the ability to work together and share information via a common space. This integration with Quire lets users communicate with teammates while directly working on the Quire project.

item.title: Even Zoom CEO has Zoom Fatigue: How to Stop Being Burnout in the Remote Working Era
item.dc:creator: Quire Marketing Team
item.description: Finding that working from home has left you feeling burnt out? Here are 10 thinks you can do to prevent burnout and be more productive and happy.
